summary.span: 表示 控件中的元素的线性集合。

span.span: Represents a linear collection of elements in a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类表示 联接在带区中的元素，这些元素可作为一个组进行操作。The class represents elements joined together in a band that can be manipulated as a group. 每个元素通常是 或其派生类之一的实例。Each element is typically an instance of or one of its derived classes. 虽然 与每个带区相关联，但标题单元不会被视为带区的元素。Although a is associated with each band, header cells are not considered elements of the band. 和类的基类 。 is the base class of the and classes. 该类型没有公共构造函数 ，因此访问带区的唯一方法是通过中的列和行 。There are no public constructors for the type, so the only way to access a band is through columns and rows in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 来操作中单元组的属性 。The following code example uses a to manipulate properties of groups of cells in a . [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#0)]

span.span: Creates an exact copy of this band.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法可以复制单元格的行或列。Use this method to duplicate a row or column of cells.

para.span: 当 在派生类中重写时，调用基类的 方法，以便将基类的属性复制到新的带区，并确保还复制已添加到派生类的任何属性的值。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the properties of the base class are copied to the new band, and be sure to also copy the values of any properties that were added to the derived class.

summary.span: 获取或设置带区的默认单元格样式。

span.span: Gets or sets the default cell style of the band.

value.span: 与 关联的 。

span.span: The associated with the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认单元格样式应用于没有关联样式的单元格。The default cell style is applied to cells that do not have an associated style. 获取此属性时， 如果默认单元格样式不存在，则将创建具有默认值的。When getting this property, a with default values will be created if the default cell style does not exist. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置中第一列的默认单元格样式 。The following code example sets the default cell style for the first column in a . abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 调用后 ，必须释放对的所有引用， 以便垃圾回收器能够回收占用的内存 。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法由公共 `Dispose()` 方法和 方法调用。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 调用受保护的 `Dispose(Boolean)` 方法，并将 `disposing` 参数设置为 `true` 。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Dispose`在设置为的情况调用 `disposing` `false` 。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当 `disposing` 参数为 true 时，此方法释放该引用的任何托管对象所持有的所有资源 。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法将调用每个被引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 当重写时， 请注意不要引用先前在调用时已释放的对象 。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现的详细信息 ，请参阅 [实现 Dispose 方法](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose).

para.span: 有关和的详细 信息 ，请参阅 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) 和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 释放与带区关联的资源。

span.span: Releases the resources associated with the band.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法重写 。This method overrides . 应用程序代码不应调用此方法; `Finalize` 在垃圾回收过程中会自动调用对象的方法，除非已通过调用方法禁用了垃圾回收器终止 。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [Finalize 方法和析构函数](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100))、 [清理非托管资源](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged)和 [重写 Finalize 方法](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/0s71x931(v%3dvs.100)), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](/dotnet/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/dotnet/netframework-4.0/ddae83kx(v=vs.100)). 当垃圾回收器调用此方法时，此方法将调用 方法。When called by the garbage collector, this method calls the method.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当用户滚动 时带区是否移动。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the band will move when a user scrolls through the .

value.span: 如果带区不在视图中滚动，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the band cannot be scrolled from view; otherwise, .

value.span: 默认为 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户滚动浏览时，此属性可以保存重要信息的带区 。This property can hold a band of important information in place when a user scrolls through the . 冻结带区旁边的带区会在冻结的带区上移动。Bands adjacent to the frozen band will move over the frozen band. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将冻结列和行中的单元格带区。The following code example freezes a band of cells in a column and a row. 该示例还更改了冻结带区的默认单元格样式以指定哪些带区已冻结。The example also changes the default cell style of the frozen bands to specify which bands are frozen. 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewBandDemo.cpp#7)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewBandDemo.cs#7)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewbanddemo.vb#7)]

value.span: 如果已设置 属性，则为 ；否则为 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果之前尚未访问属性，则获取属性的值会自动实例化新的。Getting the value of the property automatically instantiates a new if the property has not previously been accessed. 因此，你必须使用 属性来确定 属性当前是否设置为 实例。You must, therefore, use the property to determine whether the property is currently set to a instance. 这可用于确定由属性返回的对象的哪些属性 表示特定于带区的样式集。This is useful to determine which properties of the object returned by the property represent styles set specifically for the band. 有关单元样式继承的详细信息，请参阅 [Windows 窗体 DataGridView 控件中的单元格样式](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control)。For more information about cell style inheritance, see [Cell Styles in the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](/dotnet/framework/winforms/controls/cell-styles-in-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control).

summary.span: 获取带区在 控件中的相对位置。

span.span: Gets the relative position of the band within the control.

value.span: 在包含该带区的 或 中，该带区从零开始的位置。

span.span: The zero-based position of the band in the or that it is contained within.

value.span: 默认值为 -1，指示没有任何关联的 控件。

span.span: The default is -1, indicating that there is no associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值不一定与集合中带区的当前可视位置相对应。The value of this property does not necessarily correspond to the current visual position of the band within the collection. 例如，如果用户在运行时对中的列重新排序 (假设将 属性设置为 `true`) ，则 每列的属性的值将不会更改。For example, if the user reorders columns in a at run time (assuming the property is set to `true`), the value of the property of each column will not change. 相反，列值会 更改。Instead, the column values change. 但对行进行排序时，会更改其 值。Sorting rows, however, does change their values. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性设置列标签。The following code example uses the property to set column labels. 通过访问带区的 属性 。The band's property is accessed through a . > [!NOTE] > 如果启用了视觉样式，则当前主题将覆盖行标题和列标题的显示样式属性。If visual styles are enabled, the current theme overrides the display style properties for row and column headers. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CPP/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cpp#150)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/CS/DataGridViewColumnDemo.cs#150)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos#150](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.ButtonDemos/VB/datagridviewcolumndemo.vb#150)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性影响 带区中每个单元的属性。The property affects the property of each cell in the band. 例如，如果更改了的 属性 ，则 该行中所有单元格的属性将更改。For example, if the property of a changes, then the property of all cells in the row will change. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 属性禁用整个的编辑 。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to disable editing for an entire . 此代码示例是为类提供的更大示例的一部分 。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以通过设置各个行或列的属性来防止用户调整它们的大小 。You can prevent users from resizing individual rows or columns by setting their properties. 默认情况下， 属性值基于 列的属性值和 行的属性值。By default, the property value is based on the property value for columns and the property value for rows. 如果显式设置 为 或，则将 忽略控件值。If you explicitly set to or , however, the control value is ignored. 设置 为 以还原继承。Set to to restore the inheritance. 由于 还原值继承，因此 属性永远不会返回 值，除非行或列尚未添加到 控件中。Because restores the value inheritance, the property will never return a value unless the row or column has not been added to a control. 如果需要确定是否 继承行或列的属性值，请检查其 属性。If you need to determine whether the property value of a row or column is inherited, check its property. 如果 值包括 标志，则 不会继承属性值。If the value includes the flag, the property value is not inherited. 如果 属性值为 ，则用户将不能手动调整带区大小。If the property value is , the user will not be able to manually adjust band size. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 属性设置为默认值。The following code example sets the property to the default. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CPP/mousesizing.cpp#14)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/CS/mousesizing.cs#14)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MouseBasedResizing/VB/mousesizing.vb#14)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以存储要与带区关联的任何对象。The property can store any object that you want to associate with a band. 此属性通常用于存储标识信息，例如字符串名称、唯一标识符 (例如 ) 或数据库中带区数据的索引。This property is typically used to store identifying information, such as a string name, a unique identifier (for example, a ), or the index of the band's data in a database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用 属性存储一个颜色，稍后检索该颜色以设置 属性。The following code example uses the property to store a color that is later retrieved to set the property.
